existing_features.title: Replace the img element (XPath: /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/header[1]/div[1]/div[1]/a[1]/img[1]) source with the uploaded image (image.png), storing it as a static asset in frontend/public/assets/

new_feature_requests.summary: Update the h2 element (XPath: /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/div[1]/section[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/h2[1]) to display 'Welcome back, [Their User]!' where [Their User] is replaced with the authenticated user's display name

projectName: Update welcome text and header logo with uploaded image
